name: Help The Poor
short_description:
YOU DON'T NEED A REASON TO HELP PEOPLE
http://www.1dollarsupportthepoor.com/
If you want to help someone go for it. If someone ask you why are you helping that person? You just say "you don't need a reason to help people."

Dollar for the Poor exits to unify the body of Christ in the fight against extreme global poverty, using the power of just one dollar.
We hope that you will catch the vision and imagine what could be done if every person in America, gave just $1 to help those in need.
Our main priority is to reach out to as many orphans as possible and to give them hope and encouragement through our programs. A special focus in our program is to reach out to the orphans with a disability, and those who are alone and must care for their younger siblings even though they themselves are children.
